import React, { Component } from 'react' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' import ConnectComponent from '../../../../connect' import { CreateCampaignAction } from '../../../../actions/CreateCampaign/emailCampaign' class StepOne extends Component { state = { source: 'toko-cm', type: 'General', campaignType: 'general', deviceType: 'email', userStatus: 'LOGGED_IN', channel: 'Digital', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], broadcast: true, name: '', nameError: false, } handleInputFields(key, value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } onSubmit = () => { const { nameError, steps, ...rest } = this.state const { campaignID } = this.props.CreateCampaign CreateCampaignAction({ campaignID, ...rest, next: 'step-2' }) } render() { const { steps, name, nameError, broadcast } = this.state return (
Channel : Email
Campaign Name {nameError &&
*This field is required
} this.handleInputFields('name', e.target.value)} />
Campaign Type* Broadcast Campaign {/* not active this functionality */} {/* this.setState({ trigger: !trigger, broadcast: !broadcast })} > Trigger Campaign */}
this.onSubmit()} className="float"> Continue this.props.history.goBack()} className="float grey-border" > Go Back ) } } export default ConnectComponent(StepOne)
